name: Clark Geomatics Manning Park  & Skagit Valley Park Recreation Map
categories: Manning Park&Skagit Valley Park Recreation Ma
description: BC Parks created this exceptional 1:50,000 scale map of Manning Park, and its beautiful cousin, Skagit Valley Park. These two parks share boundaries, span a huge area and offer hiking, biking, horse riding, cross-country and backcountry skiing. The map has detailed 25m contours and shaded relief, hike and traverse descriptions. GPS ready: UTM and latitude/longitude.
